      • linesIntersect

        public static boolean linesIntersect(GeoLatLng start0,
                                     GeoLatLng end0,
                                     GeoLatLng start1,
                                     GeoLatLng end1)
        Computes whether the two specified lines intersect
        Parameters:
        start0 - The start point of line 0
        end0 - The end point of line 0
        start1 - The start point of line 1
        end1 - The end point of line 1
        Returns:
        true if the two specified lines intersect; false if otherwise

      • calculateLength

        public static double calculateLength(GeoLatLng coord1,
                                     GeoLatLng coord2)
        Calculates the length in meters between two Geo coordinates
        Parameters:
        coord1 - The first coordinate
        coord2 - The second coordinate
        Returns:
        The distance between the two coordinates in meters

      • calculateOffset

        public static GeoLatLng calculateOffset(GeoLatLng fromCoordinate,
                                        double metersNorth,
                                        double metersEast)
        Calculates coordinates for the position at an offset in meters from specific coordinates.
        Parameters:
        fromCoordinate - The origin coordinates.
        metersNorth - The offset north in meters.
        metersEast - The offset east in meters.
        Returns:
        The coordinates resulting from the calculation.

      • normalizeAngle

        public static double normalizeAngle(double angle)
        Normalizes an angle to 0~359.
        Parameters:
        angle - The angle to normalize.
        Returns:
        The normalized angle.

      • isAngleBetween

        public static boolean isAngleBetween(double angleToCheck,
                                     double angleFrom,
                                     double angleTo)
        Returns true if the specified angle is between `from` and `to`. The method assumes the `to` value is higher than the `from` value and takes warps at 360~0 into account.
        Parameters:
        angleToCheck - The angle to check with.
        angleFrom - The start of the angle range.
        angleTo - The end of the angle range.
        Returns:
        true if the specified angle is between `from` and `to`; false otherwise.

      • createPolygon

        public static GeoPolygon createPolygon(GeoLatLng origin,
                                       double width,
                                       double height,
                                       double angle)
        Returns a polygon with the specified size and angle with the specified origin as the center of the polygon.
        Parameters:
        origin - The origin of the polygon.
        width - The width of the polygon.
        height - The height of the polygon.
        angle - The angle of the polygon.
        Returns:
        The created polygon with the specified size and angle with the specified origin as the center of the polygon.
